specialBuffDetails.name: Wound
specialBuffDetails.description: Reduces all healing this Monster receives by 40%. Removed at the end of the turn after healing was received.

skillDetailsWithMonstersList.skillDescription: 3 x 110% (330%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Tether and Wound.
2 x 160% (320%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt, applies a stack of Wound.
Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Congeal damage, 65% chance to inflict a Wound stack on them.
6 x 65% (390%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.
6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.
If a single hit deals more than 20% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), the enemy is afflicted with Armor Break (Debuff) and a stack of Wound.
Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison or Burn (Debuff) damage, 50% chance to inflict a Wound stack on them.
